game.name: Country Drive Simulator
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Country Drive Simulator invites you to explore a vast, fictional open world inspired by both American and European countryside landscapes. Navigate through diverse terrains, from bustling cities to serene rural areas, engaging in realistic driving experiences and logistics operations.​
